name: Ni no Kuni I/II Compilation
summary: Ni No Kuni : Revenge of the Celestial Witch Remastered Leave for another world in Ni no Kuni : The Revenge of the Celestial Witch? Remastered. More beautiful than ever, the unforgettable tale of LEVEL-5 returns to PS4 and PC with improved performance and graphics. Alongside?Oliver, explore a universe populated by new friends but also?ferocious opponents, in the?hope to bring back her mother, missing after a tragic accident. A copy of the?Almanac of the magician under his arm and accompanied by his faithful friend Lumi, Oliver will explore this abundant imaginary world to tame pets, confront enemies and overcome the innumerable trials that could?prevent him from saving his mother. Ni no Kuni II : the advent of a kingdom Dive back into the bustling world of Ni no Kuni. Explore a wonderfully realized world and discover its captivating history in a brand new game?RPG adventure. Level-5 brings together for the realization of this new Ni no Kuni : Yoshiyuki Momose, for l?character development and Joe Hisaishi, for music creation.
